pullrequest.title: Implemented orbit around an arbitrary point

content.raw: I just noticed that the orbit appears to have the same number of pixels allocated to it, no matter how far away it is from the camera. This makes it seem big when far away and small up close. Not a show-stopper, but it's a little disorienting.
content.html: I just noticed that the orbit appears to have the same number of pixels allocated to it, no matter how far away it is from the camera. This makes it seem big when far away and small up close. Not a show-stopper, but it's a little disorienting.
